Tables 1-4 provide the descriptives and intercorrelations of the variables involved in the correlation analyses for the subjects German, Math, Physics, and Chemistry. For details, see main text.

```{r german, echo = F, message = F, warning = F, results = "asis"}

# table with descriptives and correlations for german
apa_table(list(corr.german$ct, corr.german$dt),
          caption = corr.german$caption,
          midrules = 12,
          align = c("l", rep("c",ncol(df.german))),
          note = corr.german$note,
          escape = F,
          font_size = "footnotesize")
```
